ABOUT RHOMICOM SYSTEMS TECHNOLOGIES LTD

Rhomicom Systems Technologies Ltd is a fully Ghanaian company with a passion for making the latest technology in the world easily accessible and affordable to all and sundry. The company has the dream of becoming a giant in providing services and products in the areas of I.T, Electronics and Industrial Electrical Automation in General. . We undertake all sorts of computer, electronic and telecommunication based projects to satisfy our customer needs. Our commitment to our customers will be reflected through honest and responsible business dealings.

Rhomicom Systems Technologies has principles which serve as a guide in order to achieve its objectives, deliver its core business such as the development and sales of software, and meet its requirements and obligations for accountability in a more efficient and effective manner.

We believe in professionalism and as such execute projects within time frame in a cost effective way. Our employees are our greatest assets and our clients are our topmost priority.

Remember, quality should not be expensive, it should just require a “little more” commitment and Rhomicom Systems Technologies provides the “little more”.

RHOMICOM! BUILDING DREAMS!!
